body: Hereby, I attach the file (edit from Mostapha's version)  One more question: **What's the difference, if I hook up lightingControlGroups_ or not?** (Because the results are different as well, as shown in the RED arrowhead) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YiH**gdlUoXXZT-x6uqiJ2UHeof6tHQOecJBMId0qVU-i0SWpyiNXjh4jrslTJwWME-rJ0VSkwkyIJ5-ao*LBV0RQoX0Z6kH/QQ20160304013136.png)
